alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 2:00AM CST until February 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Greene, Sevier Smoky Mountains, Cocke Smoky Mountains, Blount Smoky Mountains and Southeast Monroe Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 7 AM this morning to 1 AM EST Friday. For the Wind Advisory, until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe
